recovery._comment: IPC connection recovery settings - used when server becomes unavailable
recovery._enabled_comment: Enable automatic reconnection when server drops (default: true)
recovery._max_attempts_comment: Maximum reconnection attempts before giving up (default: 10)
recovery._connection_timeout_comment: Timeout for each connection attempt in seconds (default: 5.0)
recovery._reattach_session_comment: Auto-reattach to previous session after reconnect (default: true)
